Resources.Resource Description: Provides an EC2 instance resource. This allows instances to be created, updated, and deleted. Instances also support provisioning.
Provides a security group resource.
Provides an EC2 key pair resource. A key pair is used to control login access to EC2 instances.

Services.Service Description: run and manage a web app

Resources.Resource Description: Provides an Elastic Beanstalk Environment Resource. Elastic Beanstalk allows you to deploy and manage applications in the AWS cloud without worrying about the infrastructure that runs those applications.

Provides an Elastic Beanstalk Application Resource. Elastic Beanstalk allows you to deploy and manage applications in the AWS cloud without worrying about the infrastructure that runs those applications.

Services.Service Description: run codes without thinkinng about servers

Resources.Resource Description: Provides a Lambda Function resource. Lambda allows you to trigger execution of code in response to events in AWS, enabling serverless backend solutions. The Lambda Function itself includes source code and runtime configuration.
Provides a S3 bucket resource.
Provides a resource to manage an S3 Access Point.
Provides a Glacier Vault Resource
Manages a Glacier Vault Lock. You can refer to the Glacier Developer Guide for a full explanation of the Glacier Vault Lock functionality.
Provides an Elastic File System (EFS) File System resource.
Provides an Elastic File System (EFS) access point.
Provides a VPC resource.
Provides an VPC subnet resource.
Provides a resource to create a VPC routing table.
Provides a resource to create an association between a route table and a subnet or a route table and an internet gateway or virtual private gateway.
Provides a resource to create a VPC Internet Gateway.

[IPv6 only] Creates an egress-only Internet gateway for your VPC. An egress-only Internet gateway is used to enable outbound communication over IPv6 from instances in your VPC to the Internet, and prevents hosts outside of your VPC from initiating an IPv6 connection with your instance.
Provides a resource to create a VPC NAT Gateway.
Creates an Amazon CloudFront web distribution.

Services.Service Description: Scalable DNS and Domain Name Registration

Resources.Resource Description: Provides a Route53 record resource.
Provides an RDS instance resource. A DB instance is an isolated database environment in the cloud. A DB instance can contain multiple user-created databases.
Provides an RDS Cluster Instance Resource. A Cluster Instance Resource defines attributes that are specific to a single instance in a RDS Cluster, specifically running Amazon Aurora.
Provides a DynamoDB table resource.
Manages a DocDB Cluster.
Provides an DocDB Cluster Resource Instance. A Cluster Instance Resource defines attributes that are specific to a single instance in a DocDB Cluster.

Services.Service Description: Fully-managed Docker container registry : Share and deploy container software, publicly or privately

Resources.Resource Description: Provides an Elastic Container Registry Repository.

Services.Service Description: Highly secure, reliable, and scalable way to run containers

Resources.Resource Description: Provides an ECS service - effectively a task that is expected to run until an error occurs or a user terminates it (typically a webserver or a database).
Provides an ECS cluster.

Services.Service Description: The most trusted way to start, run, and scale Kubernetes
